definition: to sell/to make or carry out (a plan or intrigue etc)

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: Reduce the set cost of customers and increase the after-sales service guarantee.
sentences.chinese: 减少客户的成套成本，增加售后服务保证。

sentences.english: However the after-sale services is the important connection which many domestic car company lacks.
sentences.chinese: 而售后服务，正是国内车企所欠缺的一个重要环节。

sentences.english: Please describe the training system for the sales and aftersales service employees.
sentences.chinese: 请阐述对销售人员及售后服务人员的培训制度。

sentences.english: Guarantee is the main point of service under non-price competition.
sentences.chinese: 非价格竞争下，产品保修是售后服务的主要内容。

sentences.english: You can depend on us; our company offers services dependably after sale.
sentences.chinese: 您可以相信我们，我们公司提供可靠的售后服务。

sentences.english: Simultaneously specialized for brand post-sale service.
sentences.chinese: 同时专业为品牌售后服务。

sentences.english: D high-quality after-sales service, product warranty for one year, life-long service.
sentences.chinese: 四售后服务质量高，产品保修一年，终身服务。

sentences.english: We established good relationship with 3L brand agents, setting up RMA centers covering the whole country.
sentences.chinese: 并且在全国建立了一套完善的售后服务维修体系。

sentences.english: The after-sales department follows a boat throughout its service life.
sentences.chinese: 售后服务部门跟进船只整个服务过程中的问题。

sentences.english: Would you please quote us your lowest price with offered after-sales service?
sentences.chinese: 能够告知您们的最低报价以及售后服务？

sentences.english: The company has a large-scale group of after service, you may go to the one which is close to you.
sentences.chinese: 公司有庞大的售后服务队伍您可以就近维修。

sentences.english: Their after-sales services are free of charge.
You need to make sure your customers are always connected, even when providing them with after-sales service.
sentences.chinese: 我们会关注客户永远在线的连接，提供售后服务。

sentences.english: With excellent cost-performance and closely perfect after-sale service and reputation industry.
sentences.chinese: 凭借优良的性价比，紧密完善的售后服务而享誉业内。

sentences.english: Provides the high quality product and the consummation post-sale service wholeheartedly for the customer.
sentences.chinese: 竭诚为客户提供优质的产品和完善的售后服务。

sentences.english: Do the local and international compressor makers differ in what they offer in regards to aftercare services?
sentences.chinese: 国内品牌和外国品牌在提供售后服务方面有什么不同？

definition: quality control (QC), abbr. for 品質控制|品质控制
to return a product for another item
to promise to keep sth in good repair/guarantee/warranty
